annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, nothing warms me up on the holidays like a Hot Spiked Apple Cider! Try this favorite drink of mine this Thanksgiving! Your T...
annotations.title: Spiked Cider | How to Drink

textContent:
8oz Cider
1 Lemon slice
1 Star anise
1 Clove

Heat till simmering

2oz Bourbon
4oz of heated cider

Garnish with cinnamon stick, lemon wheel, and star anise

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKV-Xjbipw0
title: Hot Spiked Cider
